resources.string: Displays new messages for Google Voice.
This extension requires an accessibility service to monitor Google Voice notifications. Tap to enter settings and enable the service under Accessibility -> DashClock Google Voice Extension.

This accessibility service will allow the extension to be notified when a new Google Voice notification arrives. Since Google has not provided an API for Google Voice, this extension app requires an extra service to monitor new Google Voice notifications as well as when the Google Voice app is entered.\n\nNo personal data is captured and transmitted for other purposes. Note that this extension does not have permission to access Internet and other information such as SMS and Email.
